title: Certamen religiosum, or, A conference between the late King of England and the late Lord Marquesse of Worcester concerning religion together with a vindication of the Protestant cause from the pretences of the Marquesse his last papers which the necessity of the King's affaires denyed him oportunity to answer.
author: Bayly, Thomas, d. 1657?
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for W. Lee and R. Royston ...,
